Title: Mock Two Piece Short Prom Dress

Description: This mock two piece is ready for homecoming or prom. Halter top bodice is embellished with beading for a sparkling design with a diamond shape cut out back. Beaded straps wrap around the waist giving structure to the openness of the  gown. The full skirt completes the fun and loving look.
